title: geth crash after ctrl+c
body:
geth version: develop - 796c18db93add1d145db99d6088e445a56851e8b
steps to reproduce:
- run
  
  ``` bash
  geth --shh blocktest ~/ethereum/tests/BlockChainTests/bcRPC_API_Test.json RPC_API_Test rpc
  ```
- press Ctrl + C once
  
  trace:
  
